intro: Cacalia longispica, commonly known as the long-spurred cacalia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Cacalia longispica is often found in grasslands and open woodlands, thriving in well-drained soils.
